sect1.title: OR
sect1.para: Return the logical or of the the two boolean arguments.

sect2.title: Arguments
sect2.para: Exactly two arguments are required, and they must evaluate to Booleans.

sect2.title: Returns
sect2.para: Returns the logical or of the two argument expressions.

sect2.title: Example
sect2.programlisting: make “foo or false false ; foo == false make “foo or true false ; foo == true make “foo false make “bar or :foo true ; bar = true
